mapper.select: SELECT lm.lot_no, lm.process_type, lm.wi_no, p.product_no, p.product_name, pi.process_no, pi.process_name, li.line_no, li.line_name, lm.lot_status, lm.start_time, lm.end_time, lm.create_user, lm.create_time FROM lot_master lm INNER JOIN work_instruction wi ON lm.wi_no = wi.wi_no INNER JOIN product p ON wi.product_no = p.product_no INNER JOIN process_info pi ON lm.process_no = pi.process_no LEFT JOIN line_info li ON lm.line_no = li.line_no WHERE lm.wi_no = #{wiNo} ORDER BY lm.start_time DESC

SELECT DISTINCT l.lot_no as lotNo, l.parent_lot_no as parentLotNo, l.process_type as processType, l.wi_no as wiNo, p.product_no as productNo, p.product_name as productName, pi.process_no as processNo, pi.process_name as processName, li.line_no as lineNo, li.line_name as lineName, l.lot_status as lotStatus, l.start_time as startTime, l.end_time as endTime, l.create_user as createUser FROM product p LEFT JOIN work_instruction wi ON p.product_no = wi.product_no LEFT JOIN lot_master l ON wi.wi_no = l.wi_no LEFT JOIN process_info pi ON l.process_no = pi.process_no LEFT JOIN line_info li ON l.line_no = li.line_no WHERE (#{productNo} = 0 OR p.product_no = #{productNo}) AND l.lot_no IS NOT NULL ORDER BY l.start_time DESC

SELECT lpl.process_log_no as processLogNo, lpl.lot_no as lotNo, lpl.wi_no as wiNo, pi.process_no as processNo, pi.process_name as processName, li.line_no as lineNo, li.line_name as lineName, lpl.action_type as actionType, lpl.input_qty as inputQty, lpl.output_qty as outputQty, lpl.create_user as createUser, lpl.create_time as createTime FROM lot_process_log lpl INNER JOIN process_info pi ON lpl.process_no = pi.process_no LEFT JOIN line_info li ON lpl.line_no = li.line_no WHERE lpl.lot_no = #{lotNo} ORDER BY lpl.process_log_no DESC

SELECT lql.qc_log_no as qcLogNo, lql.lot_no as lotNo, pi.process_no as processNo, pi.process_name as processName, qm.qc_code as qcCode, qm.qc_name as qcName, lql.measure_value as measureValue, lql.judgement as judgement, lql.inspector as inspector, lql.check_time as checkTime, lql.create_user as createUser, lql.create_time as createTime FROM lot_qc_log lql INNER JOIN process_info pi ON lql.process_no = pi.process_no INNER JOIN qc_master qm ON lql.qc_code = qm.qc_code WHERE lql.lot_no = #{lotNo} ORDER BY lql.qc_log_no DESC

WITH LOT_HIERARCHY AS ( SELECT lm.lot_no, lm.parent_lot_no, lm.process_type, lm.wi_no, p.product_no, p.product_name, lm.process_no, pi.process_name, lm.line_no, li.line_name, lm.lot_status, cd.common_detail_name as status_name, lm.start_time, lm.end_time, lm.create_user, LEVEL as hierarchy_level, CONNECT_BY_ROOT lot_no as root_lot_no, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(lot_no, '/') as lot_path FROM lot_master lm LEFT JOIN work_instruction wi ON lm.wi_no = wi.wi_no LEFT JOIN product p ON wi.product_no = p.product_no LEFT JOIN process_info pi ON lm.process_no = pi.process_no LEFT JOIN line_info li ON lm.line_no = li.line_no LEFT JOIN common_detail cd ON lm.lot_status = cd.common_detail_code START WITH lot_no = #{lotNo} CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR lot_no = parent_lot_no ORDER SIBLINGS BY start_time DESC ) SELECT * FROM LOT_HIERARCHY ORDER BY hierarchy_level, lot_path
